title: Smile for Me
description: Kim Penney knows the importance of a good plan. She has spent years concentrating on getting good grades so that she can get into a good college, get a good job, and settle down with a good dependable man. It is a good plan, but unfortunately she needs Marshall's help to make it happen.Marshall is more than willing to help (truth be told, he would do anything for Kim Penney), but he has one condition. Marshall thinks Kim needs learn to loosen up and have some fun. And he thinks he's just the guy to teach her.
author: T.J. Dell
